content: this is a top-down sock pattern worked on sport weight yarn featuring a simple cable-and-rib pattern that is symmetrical on both socks a great choice for your favourite sport weight sock yarn and a quick knit compared to typical fingering weight socks this pattern has been fully updated in june 2016 to execute this pattern knitters will be required to work in the round work knit and purl sts work decreases ssk k2tog pick up sts turning a heel these socks are worked in the round from the cuff down and use a heel flap with turned heel this pattern is written for a set of 4 double-pointed needles dpns if you prefer to use magic loop method or set of 5 dpns please feel free to adjust the instructions to suit your preferred method
